mapper.select:
SELECT C.CASTING_NO, C.USER_ID, C.CLIENT_ID, CODEARR_SELECT(C.E_TYPE) ETYPE, C.E_INTRO, C.E_SDT, C.E_LDT, C.E_STIME, C.E_LTIME, C.CASTING_PRICE, C.DT,
CASE WHEN TRUNC(C.E_LDT) < TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND C.PROGRESS != '행사취소' AND C.PROGRESS != '정산완료' AND C.PROGRESS != '노쇼' THEN '행사완료' ELSE PROGRESS END AS PROGRESS, C.CANCEL
FROM CASTING C
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CASTING(CASTING_NO, USER_ID, CLIENT_ID, E_TYPE, E_INTRO, E_SDT, E_LDT, E_STIME, E_LTIME, CASTING_PRICE, DT) VALUES('CA'||CAST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{clientId}, #{eType}, #{eIntro}, #{eSdt}, #{eLdt}, #{eStime}, #{eLtime}, #{castingPrice}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT C.CASTING_NO, C.USER_ID, C.CLIENT_ID, C.CASTING_PRICE, TRUNC(C.E_LDT) - TRUNC(SYSDATE) AS LASTDAY, CASE WHEN TRUNC(C.E_LDT) - TRUNC(SYSDATE) >= 14 THEN C.CASTING_PRICE WHEN TRUNC(C.E_LDT) - TRUNC(SYSDATE) >= 7 THEN C.CASTING_PRICE * 0.5 WHEN TRUNC(C.E_LDT) - TRUNC(SYSDATE) >= 4 THEN C.CASTING_PRICE * 0.3 ELSE 0 END AS CHECKS FROM CASTING C WHERE C.CASTING_NO = #{castingNo}
